reviewText: I didn't watch it on disc but would definitely recommend this to anybody. It's short and sweet, very well written with rich characters. I found this anime helpful in accepting aspects of life that I won't mention due to spoilers.
It's a cute anime but kinda short a little it's a little pricey should be like ten bucks only 6 episodes
I've been waiting 6 years for this to get an American release. It finally happened.
Enjoyable show, I would highly recommend it to anybody who enjoys anime.

Good story. The art not bad. The story bite sad but it work out. It like MYSLF YOUR SLF Anime. The price was good!
I also saw it on Youtube long time ago and forgotten about. Glad that I saw it again!

One of the most beautiful and romantic stories I've ever experienced. Also known as "Hanbun no Tsuki ga Noboru Sora" or "Hantsuki," this tale possesses a strong message about the trials of young love and how precious a life can be. Combined with heartwarming and unforgettable characters, Looking Up at the Half-Moon will bring tears to your eyes and grab hold of your attention through each episode. A must experience for any anime or romance fan.
